msbt.message: The Fishing Tourney is ON! I've been practicin' for this, and now it's time to show everyone what I've got!
Nine o'clock. Today. Fishing Tourney. I didn't practicebecause I couldn't be readier, !What's so hard about fishin', anyway? The only thing I need to win is my can-do attitude!
The Fishing Tourney starts at nine! Were you too excited to sleep too?
It's tourney time! I'm gonna fish till I barf, !
Got clear skies, a bucket of bait, and an empty schedule. Nothin' left to get between me and EVERY FISH!
'Sup? I figured you'd be in this thing too. Let's go at those fish with both hands, !
Bwa ha ha! I fished so hard that they're gonna have to rename it -ing!
I didOK, I guess. It just means I'll have to get EXTRA revved up for the next one!
Whew! What a tourney, huh? Now comes the hard partfigurin' out what to do with all the fish!
If you wanna sign up for the tourney, I'm sure C.J. would love to have you. He's over in the plaza.
What's the deadline for the tourney again? Was itsix o'clock? Am I remembering that right?
If you wanna win the tourney, you gotta go big. I'm psyching myself up!
Ah, the thrill of a bite on the line Every tug and thrash is somethin' special between you and the fish.
